songs.title: Zeester met Koffie
songs.author: Bart Peeters
songs.lyrics:
intro:	A	Bm7	E7sus4	     A -  A/G#
	F#m7	Bm7	E7sus4	       /       /      /	
 
 
     A         Bm7	        E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
   Duffel half negen, speelplein van de kleuterklas
  F#m7          Bm7                E7sus4        A
   In de rij en juf Katrien keek of iedereen er was
       A             Bm7	       E7sus4        A   -   A/G#
   We waren prachtig gedresseerd, goeie morgen juf Katrien
 F#m7             Bm7       	   E7sus4             A
   Ik stond tussen Bob en Marga, de rest kon ik niet zien
 
       A              Bm7	  E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
   We waren allemaal doodgewoon, behalve Cynthia Roos
       F#m7              Bm7                     E7sus4       A
   Het ging niet om haar gekke naam, maar om haar boterhammendoos
      A           Bm7	        E7sus4         A   -   A/G#
   In onze trommel zat gewoon een boterham met ei
        F#m7             Bm7         E7sus4          A
   Maar vroeg je het aan Cynthia, weet je wat ze dan zei ?
 
 
		 A          Bm7      E7sus4         A   -   A/G#
	Ze zei: zeester met koffie 	en een mandarijn
	    F#m7          Bm7         E7sus4        A
	Een boterkoek met confituur en stukje marsepein
	     A          Bm7	    E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
	Onze ogen vielen open,    we waren nog heel klein
	 F#m7       Bm7         E7sus4               A
	Zeester met koffie,    en meer moet dat niet zijn
 
 
    A            Bm7	           E7sus4        A   -   A/G#
   Cynthia stond lachend een beetje verder in de rij
     F#m7            Bm7            E7sus4               A
   Ze zei: ik heb het wel gezien, jij hebt een boon voor mij
    A                Bm7       E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
   Ik werd rood, ik stamelde:   Cynthia alsjeblieft
      F#m7           Bm7            E7sus4           A
   Ze keek achter m’n oren, want tot daar was ik verliefd
 
 
  	  A         Bm7        E7sus4         A   -   A/G#
	Zeester met koffie        en een mandarijn
           F#m7           Bm7            E7sus4         A
	Een boterkoek met confituur en een stukje marsepein
         A                Bm7	    E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
	Hersenen zijn als pudding die tussen je oren rijpt
        F#m7        Bm7         E7sus4          A
	Zeester met koffie,       tot je dat begrijpt
 
 
instrum:	A       Bm7	   E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
		F#m7    Bm7        E7sus4             A
		A       Bm7	   E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
		F#m7    Bm7        E7sus4             A
 
 
            A            Bm7	      E7sus4             A - A/G#
We speelden tikkertje en Batman en omdat Cynthia dat soms wou
   F#m7          Bm7           E7sus4            A
   Ook wel iets romantisch, bijvoorbeeld man en vrouw
               A                     Bm7	
   M’n kleine broer beweerde dat hij priester was
          E7sus4            A   -   A/G#
   en hij heeft er ons ingeluisd
  F#m7            Bm7              E7sus4            A
   Hij verbond ons in de echt, maar toen zijn we verhuisd
 
 
         A          Bm7        E7sus4         A   -   A/G#
	Zeester met koffie        en een mandarijn
           F#m7           Bm7        E7sus4              A
	We gingen weg uit Duffel, het lot kan gruwelijk zijn
           A              Bm7	    E7sus4              A - A/G#
	Ik was een kouwe, loze hond, zoals dat wel eens gaat
                    F#m7        Bm7
	Ik droom nog regelmatig dat haar pa
           E7sus4            A
        mij op mijn bakkes slaat
 
 
         A          Bm7       E7sus4         A   -   A/G#
	Zeester met koffie       en een mandarijn
             F#m7            Bm7         E7sus4                 A
	Een gebroken hart met confituur en meer moet dat niet zijn
                A                   Bm7	
	Ik heb Cynthia nooit meer teruggezien
           E7sus4          A   -   A/G#
        wat tactloos is en dom
              F#m7          Bm7              E7sus4              A
	't Is daarom dat ik principieel nooit meer in Duffel kom

songs.title: Ram Sailee (Ode to my Father)
songs.author: Bipul Chettri
songs.lyrics:
G       D       Em        C
Ram sailee Ma ta Yo banako Pirale
G       D      Cadd9      G
Gum Khaye Yesai Khola Kinarai Ma
G       D       Em        C
Ram sailee Ma ta Yo banako Pirale
G       D      Cadd9      G
Gum Khaye Yesai Khola Kinarai Ma

songs.title: Soren
songs.author: beabadoobee
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
E
 
 
[Verse 1]
E
Miss your hair
                                 A
I like the way you stare into my eyes
               E
Most of the time
    E
The way you touch me's like the curse that can’t be broken
      A
But it hurts
               E
Most of the time
 
 
[Chorus]
       A
And if there was a place that I had to choose
     B
Or a memory, that faith, that I cannot lose
   A
If there was a place that I could call home
B
Before I die, you oughta know
G#m     A              E
It'd be in your arms tonight
 
 
[Verse 2]
E
The green in your eyes
 
Are like the leaves in the summer
      A                        E
And it changes with the weather
E
The pink in your cheeks
 
When you slightly lose your temper
        A                  E
Makes me love you even more
 
 
[Chorus]
        A
And if there was a place that I had to choose
    B
Or a memory, that faith, that I cannot lose
   A
If there was a place that I could call home
B
Before I die, you oughta know
        F#m     A      E
It'd be in your arms tonight
        A       B      E
It’d be in your arms tonight

songs.title: Wonderwall
songs.author: Oasis
songs.lyrics:
[Intro]
Em   G   D   A7sus4
Em   G   D   A7sus4
Em   G   D   A7sus4
Em   G   D   A7sus4
 
 
[Verse 1]
Em       G
Today is gonna be the day
              D                  A7sus4
That they're gonna throw it back to you
Em          G
By now you should've somehow
    D                A7sus4
Realised what you gotta do
 
Em                   G
I don't believe that anybody
 D           A7sus4              C D  A7sus4  A7sus4
Feels the way I do about you now
 
 
[Verse 2]
Em           G
Backbeat the word is on the street
          D                 A7sus4
That the fire in your heart is out
Em              G
I'm sure you've heard it all before
          D             A7sus4
But you never really had a doubt
Em                   G       D
I don't believe that anybody feels
           A7sus4            Em  G  D  A7sus4
The way I do about you now
 
 
[Pre-Chorus]
     C                D            Em
And all the roads we have to walk are winding
     C                D                Em
And all the lights that lead us there are blinding
 C              D
There are many things that I would
G       D      Em
Like to say to you
       D      A7sus4
But I don't know how
 
 
[Chorus]
         C    Em  G
Because maybe
        Em                   C        Em  G
You're gonna be the one that saves me?
     Em   C  Em  G
And after all
                Em  C  Em  G   Em
You're my wonderwall
 
 
[Verse 3]
Em        G
Today was gonna be the day
             D                  A7sus4
But they'll never throw it back to you
Em         G
By now you should've somehow
    D                    A7sus4
Realised what you're not to do
Em                   G
I don't believe that anybody
D            A7sus4
Feels the way I do
           Em  G  D  A7sus4
About you now
 
 
[Pre-Chorus]
     C                  D              Em
And all the roads that lead you there are winding
     C                   D             Em
And all the lights that light the way are blinding
 C              D                  G       D      Em
There are many things that I would like to say to you
       D      A7sus4
But I don't know how
 
 
[Chorus]
        C    Em  G
I said maybe
        Em                   C        Em  G
You're gonna be the one that saves me?
     Em   C  Em  G
And after all
           Em   C   Em  G  Em
You're my wonderwall
        C             Em   G
I said maybe (I said maybe)
        Em                   C        Em  G
You're gonna be the one that saves me?
     Em   C  Em  G
And after all
           Em   C   Em  G  Em
You're my wonderwall
        C             Em   G
I said maybe (I said maybe)
        Em                   C               Em      G
You're gonna be the one that saves me? (that saves me)
        Em                   C               Em      G
You're gonna be the one that saves me? (that saves me)
        Em                   C               Em      G  Em
You're gonna be the one that saves me? (that saves me)
 
 
[Solo]
e|--------3-0----|
B|-1-0-1---------|
G|---------------|
D|---------------|   x8
A|---------------|
E|---------------|

songs.title: Hamro Nepal Ma
songs.author: Neetesh Jung Kunwar
songs.lyrics:
[Verse]
G               Cadd9
Ghar aagana ani saathi bhai
Em7                 D
Darshan namaste hai sabailai
G                 Cadd9
Sukha dukha vannu yestai raichha
Em7               D
Ko afno bidesh ma ko paraai
Cadd9            D
Thulaa sahar yahaa beglai sochaai
Cadd9            D
Aaipuge ma pani kei garna laai
Cadd9               D
Sabai lai samjahana mann bata nai
Cadd9             D
Aashaa cha maya yo namaros hai
 
[Chorus]
G                   Cadd9
Mero tana aile yaha vayae ni
Em7               D         G         Cadd9
Mann vane saannani utaichha haamro Nepal ma
Em7      D
Hamro Nepal ma
 
[Verse]
G            Cadd9
Mann thiyena yaha aauna lai
Em7       D
Mari meti dhann kamauna lai
G                  Cadd9
k garnu desh bhari berojgaari
Em7              D
Thaamna sakiyena riin ko bhaari
Cadd9          D
Aama meri timi kshitij paari
Cadd9                  D
Yaad aaucha jhalajhali mutu bhari
Cadd9              D
Baba ra bahini lai thikai cha ni ?
Cadd9               D
Samjhanchan hola ni malai pani ?
 
[Chorus]
G                   Cadd9
Mero tana aile yaha vayae ni
Em7               D         G         Cadd9
Mann vane saannani utaichha haamro Nepal ma
Em7      D
Hamro Nepal ma
 
[Verse]
G              Cadd9
Maaya meri timi narunu hai
Em7               D
Aaune chhu ma ali parkhanu hai
G               Cadd9
Jindagi ma mero timi bahek
Em7               D
Koi chhaina chitta nadukhaunu hai
Cadd9               D
Sanchai chhu ma pira nalinu hai
Cadd9          D
Samaya le kaha purai dyo khoi
 
[Chorus]
G                   Cadd9
Mero tana aile yaha vayae ni
Em7               D         G         Cadd9
Mann vane saannani utaichha haamro Nepal ma
Em7      D
Hamro Nepal ma hooo
 
G                   Cadd9
Mero tana aile yaha vayae ni
Em7               D         G         Cadd9
Mann vane saannani utaichha haamro Nepal ma
Em7      D
Pyaro Nepal ma
